title: i need support
body:
where I can be treated???
the riot support dont answers
or how many days it takes?

replies.body:
Hey Tadao Yokoshima,

It depends on the ticket type. If it's a Player Behavior related ticket, it may be quite a while if you've just submitted.

but is still unanswered\
i really need contact a game master
Actually, from what I've heard from another summoner, the response time may be about 2 weeks at this time. Haven't confirmed that this is in fact true; however, it's just what I heard.
